channel.title: CVE Feed for openedx -- xblock-drag-and-drop-v2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for openedx -- xblock-drag-and-drop-v2

item.title: CVE-2022-46147|2024-08-03T14:24:03.266Z -- openedx -- xblock-drag-and-drop-v2
item.description: Drag and Drop XBlock v2 implements a drag-and-drop style problem, where a learner has to drag items to zones on a target image. Versions prior to 3.0.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting in multiple XBlock Fields. Any platform that has deployed the XBlock may be impacted. Version 3.0.0 contains a patch for this issue. There are no known workarounds.
